query:
-- Primero obtener el ID de AXA
SET @axaId = (SELECT id FROM companies WHERE name LIKE '%AXA%' LIMIT 1);

-- Crear usuario empresa de prueba (contraseña: test123)
-- Hash bcrypt de "test123": $2b$10$rQ8K8mZ4Z4Z4Z4Z4Z4Z4ZeK8K8mZ4Z4Z4Z4Z4Z4Z4ZeK8K8mZ4Z4Z
INSERT INTO users (openId, name, email, password, loginMethod, role, createdAt, updatedAt, lastSignedIn)
VALUES ('test-company-axa-001', 'Usuario Prueba AXA', 'prueba-axa@test.com', '$2b$10$YQRiQE.5PpBkqjp.8ssW.OW3R3NVR9wgOHoABC31dKK4T.p5wROm.', 'password', 'empresa', NOW(), NOW(), NOW());

-- Obtener el ID del usuario recién creado
SET @userId = LAST_INSERT_ID();

-- Vincular usuario con empresa AXA en companyUsers
INSERT INTO companyUsers (userId, companyId, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (@userId, @axaId, NOW(), NOW());

-- Mostrar resultado
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.role, cu.companyId, c.name as companyName
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN companyUsers cu ON u.id = cu.userId
LEFT JOIN companies c ON cu.companyId = c.id
WHERE u.email = 'prueba-axa@test.com';

-- Primero obtener el ID de AXA
SET @axaId = (SELECT id FROM companies WHERE name LIKE '%AXA%' LIMIT 1);

-- Crear usuario empresa de prueba (contraseña: test123)
-- Hash bcrypt de "test123": $2b$10$rQ8K8mZ4Z4Z4Z4Z4Z4Z4ZeK8K8mZ4Z4Z4Z4Z4Z4Z4ZeK8K8mZ4Z4Z
INSERT INTO users (openId, name, email, password, loginMethod, role, createdAt, updatedAt, lastSignedIn)
VALUES ('test-company-axa-001', 'Usuario Prueba AXA', 'prueba-axa@test.com', '$2b$10$YQRiQE.5PpBkqjp.8ssW.OW3R3NVR9wgOHoABC31dKK4T.p5wROm.', 'password', 'empresa', NOW(), NOW(), NOW());

-- Obtener el ID del usuario recién creado
SET @userId = LAST_INSERT_ID();

-- Vincular usuario con empresa AXA en companyUsers
INSERT INTO companyUsers (userId, companyId, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (@userId, @axaId, NOW(), NOW());

-- Mostrar resultado
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.role, cu.companyId, c.name as companyName
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN companyUsers cu ON u.id = cu.userId
LEFT JOIN companies c ON cu.companyId = c.id
WHERE u.email = 'prueba-axa@test.com';
